title: It's in your power
brief_description: Designed to help farmers overcome some of the problems confronting their industry and the use and benefits of hand held electric tools in agriculture. Some methods of training in the use of the tools are shown during a visit to the Lackham School of Agriculture, Wiltshire; illustrates practical applications of these lessons with the tools in service arund the farm.
